original_text: And as they were afraid, and bowed down their faces to the earth, they said unto them, Why seek ye the living among the dead?
korean_text: 여자들이 두려워 얼굴을 땅에 대니 두 사람이 이르되 어찌하여 살아 있는 자를 죽은 자 가운데서 찾느냐

sentences.original_text: and bowed down their faces to the earth
Why seek ye the living among the dead?
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 죽은 자 가운데서 살아있는 자를 찾느냐?
